name: California Wildfires
description: Massive wildfires have spread across California, causing evacuations and destruction.

name: Japan Earthquake
description: A 7.8 magnitude earthquake struck Japan, triggering a tsunami warning.

name: Hurricane Katrina
description: One of the deadliest hurricanes in US history, flooding New Orleans.

name: Mount St. Helens Eruption
description: A major volcanic eruption in Washington state that reshaped the landscape.

name: Indian Ocean Tsunami
description: A devastating tsunami triggered by a 9.1-magnitude earthquake, affecting many countries.

name: Amazon Rainforest Deforestation
description: Deforestation continues to threaten the Amazon rainforest, impacting biodiversity and climate.
